amendment.description: Amendment provides that the Secretary shall apply section 501 of the McKinney-Vento Homeless Assistance Act (42 U.S.C. 11411) to the extent practicable, to any buildings identified for disposal in the approved recommendations that are not more than 25,000 square feet or valued at less than $5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 112-385 to provide for a review of properties for use for the homeless.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Denham amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Denham.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Denham amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
